parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x coordinate of the DOMRect's origin.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y coordinate of the DOMRect's origin.

members.name: DOMRectReadOnly.x
members.description: The x coordinate of the DOMRect's origin.

members.name: DOMRectReadOnly.y
members.description: The y coordinate of the DOMRect's origin.

members.name: DOMRectReadOnly.top
members.description: Returns the top coordinate value of the DOMRect (has the same value as y, or y + height if height is negative.)

members.name: DOMRectReadOnly.right
members.description: Returns the right coordinate value of the DOMRect (has the same value as x + width, or x if width is negative.)

members.name: DOMRectReadOnly.bottom
members.description: Returns the bottom coordinate value of the DOMRect (has the same value as y + height, or y if height is negative.)

members.name: DOMRectReadOnly.left
members.description: Returns the left coordinate value of the DOMRect (has the same value as x, or x + width if width is negative.)

members.name: DOMRectReadOnly.fromRect()
members.description: Creates a new DOMRect object with a given location and dimensions.

parameters.name: rectangle Optional
parameters.description: An object specifying the location and dimensions of a rectangle. All properties default to 0. The properties are:
